unit: Unit 9 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Slopes
title: Ice Cream Shop | 1 of 3
question_text:
An owner of a local ice cream shop wishes to determine if a positive linear relationship exists between high temperatures and the shopâ€™s profits recorded that day.
The owner recorded sales from the last $50\text{ days}$ of the summer and performed a linear regression $T$-interval on temperature vs. sales at $95\%$ confidence.
The appropriate degrees of freedom for this situation is
